item.title: Arch下载官方镜像列表Official mirrors
item.description: Official mirrors The official Arch Linux mirror list is available from the pacman-mirrorlist package. To get an even more up-to-date list of mirrors, use the Pacman Mirror List Generator page on the main site. 手动下载镜像列表 有时因为系统镜像列表丢失或可读性不强，我们需要从官方网站
